keyPolicies.policyDescription: Addressing issues with Slough traffic flows and parking; tackling waste of millions of pounds and traffic gridlock
Reversing the decline of Slough High Street by encouraging quality shops and restaurants to return to the centre of Slough
Bringing back our University campus - a town the size of Slough should have its own University to educate its residents

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Vince Cable, Alex Salmond

issues.economy: Claims that under Labour's leadership, spending and debt would increase, leading to job losses and economic issues that Britain can't afford.

images.caption: Leaflet image of Gurcharan Singh with information about his priorities for Slough.
